alert.note: Alert for Collingsworth; Donley; Gray; Hemphill; Roberts; Wheeler (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 11 at 4:24AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Wheeler, Gray, western Collingsworth, southeastern Roberts, southwestern Hemphill and Donley Counties through 500 AM CDT... At 424 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Lefors to 7 miles east of Greenbelt Lake to 7 miles south of Brice. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Clarendon, Miami, Mclean, Lefors, Howardwick, Hedley, Lelia Lake, New Mobeetie, Lake Mcclellan, Quail, Kellerville, Lora, Alanreed, Codman, Greenbelt Lake and Mobeetie. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Collingsworth; Donley; Gray; Hemphill; Roberts; Wheeler
